title: Autonomous High-Fidelity Feedback Loop (FBL) & 120% Quality Standard
summary: This Knowledge Item defines the 'Autonomous Feedback Loop' (FBL), a mission-critical workflow designed to achieve 120% quality. 2026-02-06 updates introduced Phase 44-47 (Coordinate/Freshness/Resilience audits), Phase 48 (Multi-Persona Simulated Team Review), Phase 49 (Post-Export Binary Integrity Audit), and Phase 50-55 (Diagnostic Render Guard, Persistence Sync, Input Completeness, Volatile State Preservation, and Batch Fidelity Flush), leveraging rigorous artifact assertions to verify cross-resolution consistency and legacy data resilience.
